SELECT prdt_id, prdt_nm, prdt_desct, prdt_prc, get_common(sale_st) as saleSt, reg_dt, mod_dt, get_scat(s_cat_id) as sCatId, get_lcat(l_cat_id) as lCatId FROM product
AND prdt_nm LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%'
AND l_cat_id LIKE '%' || #{lCatId} || '%'
AND s_cat_id LIKE '%' || #{sCatId} || '%'
AND reg_dt >= #{regDt} and TRUNC(reg_dt) <= #{modDt}
AND sale_st IN
#{item}
ORDER BY prdt_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET prdt_nm = #{prdtNm}, prdt_desct = #{prdtDesct}, prdt_prc = #{prdtPrc}, sale_st = #{saleSt}, mod_dt = sysdate, s_cat_id = #{sCatId}, l_cat_id = #{lCatId} WHERE prdt_id = #{prdtId}
